content:
Yes, there are plenty of great dining options around the Boston Common. Here are a few recommendations:

- The Thinking Cup: This is a popular coffee shop that serves sandwiches, salads, pastries, and coffee in a cozy atmosphere. It's located just a short walk from the Boston Common. - Sam LaGrassa's: If you're in the mood for a classic Boston sandwich, head to Sam LaGrassa's. It's a small sandwich shop that serves some of the best corned beef and pastrami sandwiches in town. - The Paramount: This is a casual restaurant that serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. They have a range of options, from omelets and pancakes to salads and burgers. - Boston Public Market: This is a year-round indoor market that features locally-sourced produce, meats, and seafood. You can find a variety of food vendors selling everything from fresh smoothies to lobster rolls. - Shake Shack: If you're in the mood for a burger and fries, check out Shake Shack, a popular fast-casual burger chain that has a location near the Common. These are just a few options – there are many other great places to eat near the Boston Common depending on what you're in the mood for!
